app.title: Instagram Unfollower Tracker
app.description: Discover who unfollowed you on Instagram with our privacy-first tracking tool

hero.title: Track Your Instagram Unfollowers
hero.subtitle: Discover who unfollowed you with complete privacy
hero.description: Our tool helps you track who unfollowed you on Instagram without compromising your account security. All processing happens locally in your browser.

privacy.title: 100% Privacy
privacy.description: All processing happens locally in your browser

noLogin.title: No Login Required
noLogin.description: No need to share your Instagram credentials

devices.title: Works on All Devices
devices.description: Track unfollowers on desktop, tablet, or mobile

upload.title: Upload Your Instagram Data
upload.description: Upload both your followers and following Instagram data files (JSON format) to analyze your relationships. All processing happens in your browser - your data never leaves your device.

zip.title: Upload Instagram Data ZIP
zip.placeholder: Drag & drop or click to browse your Instagram data ZIP file

followers.title: Upload Followers File
followers.placeholder: Drag & drop or click to browse

following.title: Upload Following File
following.placeholder: Drag & drop or click to browse

status.bothUploaded: Both files uploaded successfully! Processing your data...
status.uploadRemaining: Please upload the remaining file to continue.
status.uploadBoth: Please upload both your followers and following data files to analyze your Instagram relationships.

error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.

success.title: Data Processed Successfully
success.message: Your Instagram data has been processed. Scroll down to see your results!

resetConfirmation.title: Reset All Data
resetConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to reset all data? This will delete all your import history and current data. This action cannot be undone.

instructions.title: How to get your Instagram data
steps: Log in to your Instagram account.
Long-press your user icon in the bottom right corner.
Scroll down to "Your information and permissions."
Download the file in JSON format.
Choose the date range as "All time."
Make sure the download format is set to JSON.
Instagram will send you an email when your data is ready to download.
Upload the file in the appropriate upload area above.

upload.updateMessage: Import your Instagram data regularly to track changes over time. Each import will be saved in your history, allowing you to see how your follower and following counts change.

youDontFollowBack.title: No Users Found
youDontFollowBack.description: Great news! You follow back all of your followers.

notFollowingBack.title: No Users Found
notFollowingBack.description: Great news! Everyone you follow is following you back.

newFollowers.title: New Followers
newFollowers.description: No new followers since your last import.
newFollowers.noPreviousData: To see new followers, you'll need to upload a previous data export to compare with your current one.

search.title: No Results Found
search.description: No users match your search criteria. Try a different search term.

newUnfollowers.title: New Unfollowers
newUnfollowers.description: No new unfollowers since your last import.

importHistory.title: Import History
importHistory.description: Track your Instagram growth over time by importing your data regularly

info.usernameChange: Note: If someone changed their Instagram username since your last import, they may appear as both a new follower and an unfollower.

questions.question: How do I get my Instagram data file?
questions.answer: Follow the instructions in the upload section.

questions.question: Is my data secure when using this tool?
questions.answer: Yes, all data processing happens locally in your browser. Your Instagram data never leaves your device and is not sent to our servers. This ensures complete privacy and security.

questions.question: How accurate is the unfollower detection?
questions.answer: The tool identifies users who don't follow you back with 100% accuracy. However, for detecting users who unfollowed you, Instagram doesn't provide historical follower data, so we can only show users who were following you in previous exports but not in the current one.

questions.question: Why should I use this instead of other tools?
questions.answer: Our tool provides privacy-first analysis without requiring your Instagram login credentials. Many other tools require access to your account, which poses security risks. Our tool works with your exported data file, keeping your account secure.

questions.question: Can I see who viewed my profile?
questions.answer: No, Instagram does not provide data on who views your profile, so no tool can accurately show this information.

questions.question: How often should I check for unfollowers?
questions.answer: Instagram limits data exports, so we recommend checking once every 1-2 months. This also allows enough time for meaningful changes in your follower relationships.

footer.privacy: Your data never leaves your browser. We respect your privacy.
footer.disclaimer: This tool is not affiliated with, authorized, maintained, sponsored or endorsed by Instagram or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm Aviv, nice to meet you! A developer, content creator, and tech-savvy enthusiast. I built this tool to make the things you care about on Instagram more accessible—cutting through the code and tech jargon. If you liked this tool, feel free to follow me on social media for more content and upcoming projects :)
